document.full_text: rio tinto   is close to securing a majority of riversdale mining , after receiving acceptances ahead of its target level, just before a key deadline on its a$3.9 billion ($4 billion) bid.
document.title: rio tinto closes in on riversdale, hits target
lines_and_colors: rio tinto   is close to securing a majority of riversdale mining , after receiving acceptances ahead of its target level, just before a key deadline on its a$3.9 billion ($4 billion) bid.
